actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution to honor American war dead in Vietnam by flying the flag at half staff from February 27 to March 27, 1973.

summary.text: Declares that in laying down their life for their country and the preservation of the ideals of freedom throughout the world, all American war dead in Vietnam are to be honored by their country by flying the flag at half staff from February 27 to March 27, 1973.

titles.title: Joint resolution to honor American war dead in Vietnam by flying the flag at half staff from February 27 to March 27, 1973.
